mapper.sql: select recharge_id, pan_recharge.user_id, sys_user.user_name user_name, amount, pan_recharge.status, pan_recharge.create_time, order_no, pay_info_url, request_no, order_date , pan_recharge.channel_id from pan_recharge left join sys_user on sys_user.user_id = pan_recharge.user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into pan_recharge
user_id, amount, status, order_no, pay_info_url, request_no, channel_id, create_time
#{userId}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{orderNo}, #{payInfoUrl}, #{requestNo}, #{channelId}, now()
mapper.select: select sum(amount) from pan_recharge where DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() and status = 'Completed'
SELECT count( reuser.cou ) FROM ( SELECT count( user_id ) AS cou FROM pan_recharge WHERE DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() and STATUS = 'Completed' GROUP BY user_id ) reuser
select sum(amount) from pan_recharge where status = 'Completed'
SELECT count( reuser.cou ) FROM ( SELECT count( user_id ) AS cou FROM pan_recharge WHERE STATUS = 'Completed' GROUP BY user_id ) reuser

SELECT sum( re.amount ) amount FROM pan_recharge re LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON re.user_id = u.user_id WHERE re.STATUS = 'Completed' AND ( u.parent_id = #{userId} OR u.grand_id = #{userId} OR u.great_grand_id = #{userId})
